Submodules¶

dashboard.app module¶

dashboard.prediction module¶

class dashboard.prediction.Prediction¶

Bases: object

Prediction class predicts the expected bearish/bullish market behaivior based on the widely used ‘Ichimoku’ algorithm. It monitors the moving- average (MA) over a fixed time interval and forecasts the trend further. The prediction is demonstrated in the form of a cloud, famously known as the ‘Ichimoku Cloud’. This module finally returns a figure widget which can be directly integrated with the dashboard.

fillcol(label)¶

Fill color of the cloud based on expected bearish/bullish trend.

get_prediction()¶
Get prediction range of future stock predictions for the listed stocks
Output:
df1 : pd.dataframe
plot_pred(df1)¶
Plot of future stock predictions for the listed stocks.
The output figure widget is integrated with the dashboard.
Input:
df1 : pd.dataframe; output from get_prediction function
Output:
fig : FigureWidget

dashboard.update module¶

class dashboard.update.Update(arg=None)¶

Bases: object

This module is used to update the cache. This cache is eventually used to render the dashboard. We can set the time interval for this cache refresh based on our requirements. This can be done using a cron job which runs this function at every ‘t’ time interval.

Currently, this can be set to 5 mins as it the minimum time interval for which we monitor any price change for a given stock.

save_as_pickle(parent_path='./output/')¶

dashboard.widgets module¶

class dashboard.widgets.Widgets(arg=None)¶

Bases: object

This class generates all the widgets required for the dashboard.
Each widget is generated by a separate function definiton as listed below:
get_banner_widget()¶

This method generates the banner and returns it as ipywidget.

get_cube_widget(percent_change_df)¶

This function generates an animated sector-wise performance cube widget.

Attributes:
percent_change_df: DataFrame with the precentage change in each sector
get_heatmap_widget(parent_path='./output/')¶

This function generates the heatmap ipywidget presented on the home screen. This widget reflects real-time daily performance of pre-decided stocks based on previous day’s closing price.

Attributes:
parent_path: path to the png file which is rendered as widget
get_index_stats_widget(sector_market_share, percent_change_df, data=['^DJI', '^IXIC', '^GSPC', 'QQQ'])¶

This function generates the index stats ipywidget presented on the home screen. It also includes the best performing sector for the day.

Attributes:
sector_market_share: Sector-wise major stocks and their market cap
percent_change_df: DataFrame with the precentage change in each sector
data: list of ‘index’ to be displayed on the home screen
get_sector_wise_widget(percent_change_df)¶

This function generates the sector-wise performance ipywidget.

Attributes:
percent_change_df: DataFrame with the precentage change in each sector
stock_price_plot_factory(stock_list, data_daily)¶

This function generates the stock price graph/indicator ipywidget. This is an interactive widget which reflects real-time data from yfinance. It includes dropdown menus to select among a list of stocks and the time-interval.

Attributes:
stock_list: List of stocks whose prices are to be visualized
data_daily: DataFrame on different stocks’ prices on daily-interval
ti_plot_factory(data_list, ti_list, time_intervals=['1d', '30m', '5m'], stock_list=['AAPL', 'NVDA', 'INTC', 'QCOM', 'MSFT', 'GOOGL', 'META', 'AMZN', 'WMT', 'TSLA', 'EA', 'UNH', 'AZN', 'CVS'], curr_interval='1d', cur_stock='AAPL')¶

This function generates the techincal indicator ipywidget. This is an interactive widget which reflects real-time data. It includes dropdown menus to select among a list of stocks and the time-interval.

Attributes:
data_list: list of DataFrame on different intervals
ti_list: list of DataFrame on techinical indicator objects on different intervals
curr_interval: the pre-selected interval when the widget shows up for the ifrst time
cur_stock: the pre-selected stock when the widget shows up for the ifrst time
